routines.title: Intro to Cardio
routines.summary: Cardio exercise is a healthy way to take care of your heart, lungs and body.

routines.title: Basic Routines
routines.summary: These routines are a good starting point for beginners looking to exercise.

routines.title: Intro to Weight lifting
routines.summary: This page will educate proper technique with weights for safety & better improvement.

routines.title: Leg Routines

routines.title: Killer Cardio Routines
routines.summary: If you are prepared for higher level cardio routines, find out complex routines here.
